name: Depth Zero
description:
You are on your way to Depth Zero
A turn-based arcade game where you go into depths of another dimension's hell, get cursed with debuffs ranging from slightly inconvenient to run-ruining. Cleanse debuffs or gain new blessings while traveling from one depth to another.

Controls

Basic Controls:

Drag camera with middle mouse button

Left click on player to select

Left click to move player (when selected)

Right click anywhere to deselect

Right click on enemy to attack

Tab - Show curses/blessings

R - Move camera to player's position

Settings:

F4 - Toggle Fullscreen

P - Stop animating background

[ - Make music less loud

] - Make music more loud

Shift+[ - Make sounds less loud

Shift+] - Make sounds more loud

NOTE: Camera drag is WAY less sensitive on HTML5, you need to drag your mouse across the entire screen to move the camera.

Curses

You get a new curse after completing a depth. Some curse effects can stack.

CullingEach level spawns five extra enemiesDragged BackLose one speed (Minimum: 1)
Weak CastLose one damage (Minimum: 1)
FearTake 3 damage upon entering a new depth (No, you can't die from this)Near-sightedLose one attack damage per two tiles of target distanceScared of demonsTake 3 damage whenever you are surrounded by 3 or more enemiesOverdosedDoubles the health of one enemyUltradecayDoubles the speed of stage decayRootUnable to move once every 3 turns (Doesn't stack)BlindnessCant see the enemy unless you are hit by them (Doesn't stack)Demonic DispelDispel one random blessing (Is not applied to the curse list after leaving limbo)

NOTE: You can't dispel a curse that you just got.

Blessings

You can either dispel a curse or get a blessing, which gives a situational buff

High StaminaGet an extra moveExtractorGet +2 HP when healed from a dropVampireHeal 1 HP on attackRetaliationGet 1 temporary damage after being attackedMultitargetGet an extra attackRed StarfallSpawn 1 extra drop on stageCyan StarfallGain an ability to move anywhere on your first turn (Doesn't stack)
